name: 【SPAP #1】道德與真理天使化身｜Angelic Avatars of Morality and Authenticity
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

在我來到的遠古時空，一個溫室猶如天堂般地浮空在雲層之上。我站在兩排綺麗的花圃中央，注視著這個透明的玻璃空間，感受到陽光灑落在我的臉龐上，溫暖而明亮。



突然，我的目光被一位身穿白色洋裝、頭戴光環的天使吸引住了。她站在我前方，背對著我，向右轉頭凝視著我。她的金色頭髮像絲綢一般垂落在她的包包頭上，頭飾上閃耀著白色光芒。她的裙子裙擺長及地板，輕輕地觸碰著雲朵。我注意到她長長的翅膀，璀璨的白色在陽光下閃爍。



透過溫室的玻璃門，我看到了下方遠處的山脈和多條河流，似乎有一個原始的部落在河流下游。在這個神人共存的時代，我被這美麗的夢境深深吸引，一直沉浸在這美好的畫面中無法自拔。

－

【Dream Story】

In a faraway ancient era that I stumbled upon in my dreams, a greenhouse floated high above the clouds like a heavenly paradise. Standing amidst two rows of exquisite flowerbeds, I gazed at the transparent glass space, feeling the warmth and radiance of the sunlight upon my face.



Suddenly, my attention was drawn to an angel standing before me, adorned in a white dress and a halo. She faced away from me, turning her head to the right to gaze at me. Her golden hair cascaded like silk upon her head, and her headpiece shimmered with a white radiance. Her skirt brushed lightly against the clouds, its hem grazing the floor. I noticed the glimmering white wings that extended from her back, dazzling in the sunlight.



Through the greenhouse's glass door, I caught sight of distant mountains and several rivers, with a primitive tribe residing downstream. In this era where gods and mortals coexisted, I was deeply enchanted by this beautiful dream, lost in its splendor and unable to break free

name: 【SPAP #2】封建謎信｜Feudal Superstition
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

我是這座城堡的女主人，看著我的女兒踩著樓梯向我走來。我們展開了一次心靈深處的對話，在她純真的口吻中，我感受到了她與當時的封建社會所形成的鮮明對比。

－

【Dream Story】

I am the mistress of this castle, watching my daughter walk up the stairs towards me. We had a conversation that delved deep into our souls, and in her innocent tone, I felt the stark contrast between her and the feudal society of our time.

name: 【SPAP #4】E20+歲｜My 20s in Fukuoka
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

我走在沙灘上，海風拂過臉龐，心情愉悅，卻也有種淡淡的孤寂感。



看著海天一色，我感受到了時間的流轉，人生的種種經歷像潮水般起伏不定。20多歲的我，曾經有太多追求，有太多目標需要完成，但當它們都達成時，生活其實沒有太大的改變。



在歲月的長河中，乾、苦、甜都在不斷地交替，而我則是一直自由地往前走。走到這裡，我知道自己需要的是放鬆和靜謐。我沿著海岸線漫步，看著海浪漸漸退去，心中的孤獨也慢慢消散。

－

【Dream Story】

I walked on the beach, feeling the sea breeze brushing against my face. My heart was joyful, yet there was a faint sense of loneliness. As I gazed at the endless sea and sky, I felt the passage of time, and the ups and downs of life, like the ebb and flow of the tides.



In my twenties, I had too many pursuits and goals to achieve. But when I finally attained them, life did not change significantly. In the long river of time, dryness, bitterness, and sweetness alternated constantly, while I kept walking forward freely. Now, standing here, I realize what I need is relaxation and tranquility.



I strolled along the coastline, watching the waves gradually recede, and the feeling of loneliness slowly dissipated. The scenery around me was picturesque, as if time had stood still. The sea, the sky, and the sand all merged into a perfect harmony. It was a moment of peace and contentment, as if nothing else in the world mattered.

name: 【SPAP #5】隱者的指引｜The Hermit's Silent Guidance
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

我漫步在一條小路上，不經意地來到了這個神秘而美麗的地方。眼前是一座小瀑布，水池中呈現出紫色帶點粉色的色彩，我為之心醉。四周是飛瀑流水，身處仙境般的景色，令我完全沉浸其中。



忽然，一個身穿深咖啡色斗篷的神秘人物，正站在瀑布後方，手提一盞明燈，背後有一棵古老的大樹矗立。而我，手中拿著一顆彩色會發光的球。



在這裡，感覺自由自在，充滿著包容與寬容，就像這水流一般自然而恣意。我不禁沈醉其中，彷彿置身於仙境中，完全忘卻了世俗的煩囂與喧囂。

－

【Dream Story】

I was strolling along a small path and stumbled upon this mysterious and beautiful place. Before me was a small waterfall, with a pool of water that shone in hues of purple and pink. I was enchanted by its beauty. Around me were cascading waterfalls and flowing streams, and I felt as though I was in a fairyland, completely immersed in its magic.



Suddenly, a mysterious figure in a deep brown cloak appeared behind the waterfall, carrying a lantern and standing against an ancient tree. Meanwhile, I held a colorful, luminous ball in my hand.



Here, I felt free and at ease, surrounded by a sense of tolerance and understanding, just like the natural and unrestrained flow of water. I was lost in its beauty and it was as if I was in a fairyland, completely forgetting the mundane chaos and clamor of the world.

name: 【SPAP #6】另一個自己｜Reflections of the Soul
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

我眼前的雪紡紗窗簾輕輕拂動，維多莉亞風格的金色圖騰鏡子吸引我的目光，我走向鏡前......。我仔細凝視鏡中的畫面，驚奇地發現，畫面中的那個人不是我，而是一位身姿優雅的金髮女孩。她是蓬鬆的捲短髮，綠眸銳利而又神秘。她胸前佩戴著一條古老的項鍊，用線和珍貴的寶石編織而成，呈現出一種古代原始的美感。那個女孩，是另一個我嗎？

－

【Dream Story】

The Snow Voile curtains in front of me fluttered gently, and the Victoria-style gold-patterned mirror caught my eye. I approached the mirror... and studied the image before me. To my surprise, the person in the reflection wasn't me, but a graceful blonde girl. Her hair was curly and short, her green eyes sharp and mysterious. She wore an ancient necklace, woven with thread and precious gemstones, exuding an ancient and primal beauty. Was that girl another version of myself?

name: 【SPAP #7】流離失所｜IHomeless
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

我身披盔甲，手持紅色大蘋果糖，我是一名傲然挺立的日本士兵。和我一起走在田野間的是我的妻子，她穿著一袭優雅的和服。戰爭結束後，我們不知道該往何處，只能順著山路走回家。正當我們踏上歸途時，眼前景象淒涼，稻田右側是毀壞的房屋，但依然有勤勞的農民在稻田中辛勤耕作，夕陽從我們左側緩緩落下，染紅了整片天空。



就在這時，我們經過了一顆高大的樹木。大樹的氣勢讓我產生一種靈魂深處的共鳴，仿佛大樹在提醒我，要成為像他一樣的強者，讓自己成為參天巨木般屹立不搖。



這一刻，我們彷彿置身於一個詩意縈繞的場景中。夕陽灑落，大樹如此高大挺拔，而我們也會一路走來，勇敢迎接生命中的各種挑戰，並不斷成長，茁壯成長。

－

【Dream Story】

I am a proud Japanese soldier, clad in armor and holding a red candy apple. Walking alongside me in the field is my wife, dressed in an elegant kimono. After the war ended, we didn't know where to go, so we followed the mountain path back home. As we embarked on our journey, the sight before us was desolate - on the right side of the rice field were destroyed houses, but diligent farmers still worked hard in the fields. The sunset slowly fell from our left, dyeing the entire sky red.



At that moment, we passed a tall tree. The tree's grandeur resonated deep within my soul, as if the tree was reminding me to become a strong person like it, standing tall and unshaken like a towering tree.



In this moment, we seemed to be in a poetic and dreamlike scene. As the sunset spilled, the tree stood tall and strong, and we would continue to bravely face various challenges in life, constantly growing and flourishing.

name: 【SPAP #8】想起了想死的時候｜I Remember When I Wanted to Die
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

我來到一個似乎是瑪雅神廟的神秘地窖，我點燃了一根蠟燭，發現自己周圍全是屍體，彷彿暗示了某種深刻的象徵。我在這種不安的氛圍中沉思，思緒在我的內心中編織成暗示，這些屍體是我在各年齡遭遇挫折、心生絕望的樣子。

－

【Dream Story】

I came to a mysterious cellar that seemed to be a Mayan temple. I lit a candle and found myself surrounded by corpses, as if indicating some profound symbolism. In this uneasy atmosphere, I pondered and my thoughts wove hints within my heart. These corpses represented the times in my life when I faced setbacks and felt despair at different ages.

name: 【SPAP #9】未竟｜Unfinished
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

霧氣將過往掩蓋

現在的我擁有了什麼呢



無止境地追求虛浮幻影

卻發現無論到達什麼樣的境界

又似乎一無所有，只留下一片空洞，讓人無所適從



我能否相信命運的指引嗎？

你又會將我帶往何處呢？

－

【Dream Story】

The mist shrouded the past,

What do I possess now?



Endlessly chasing illusory phantoms,

Only to find that no matter what realm I reach,

I seem to have nothing, leaving only a void, making me lost.



Can I trust the guidance of fate?

Where will you take me?

name: 【SPAP #10】流域｜River's Realm
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

踏入這個秘境，彷彿穿梭在一片充滿魔幻色彩的流域之中，壯闊的山脈巍然屹立於身後。而在這潺潺流淌的溪流中，一股神秘的力量散發著迷人的氛圍，讓人不由自主地被吸引。

－

【Dream Story】

Stepping into this secret realm, it felt as though I was journeying through a realm of enchantment, with magical hues saturating the surrounding landscape. Majestic mountains stood tall and imposing behind me, while a gentle stream flowed by, imbued with an enigmatic power that exuded an irresistible allure.

name: 【SPAP #19】藝術秘境貴賓畫鑑｜Artistic Oasis: VIP Collection
description:

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

【夢境故事】

尊貴時刻緊繫，藝術之門緩緩開啟，恣意品味唯美風華，奢華之境獨享。

－

At the precious moment, as the door of art slowly opens, indulge in the exquisite beauty and savor the luxurious realm that is exclusively yours.

name: 【SPAP #30】遺忘的村落｜Forgotten Vill
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

藍天白雲，遠方連綿的山脈屹立於天際，穿越山脈的河川在眼前蜿蜒流淌。原始村落在視野的左前方，遠至難以辨認，我卻身處極高的地方，隱約可見那萬物生長之處。我站在雲電梯內，懸浮於雲間，雲霧繚繞，窗外的結界透射出白色光芒，恍若置身仙境。



我忐忑不安，卻也充滿好奇，因為我即將迎接我過去的自己，探索那個未知的自我，期待著尋找到失落的記憶。

－

【Dream Story】

Under the blue sky and white clouds, the distant mountain range stood tall on the horizon, and the river snaked through the mountains before me. The primitive village lay ahead on the left, its distance too far to discern. Yet I stood at a great height, peering towards the source of all life. Within the cloud elevator, I floated in the mist, surrounded by a white glow that seemed to transport me to a magical realm.



Despite feeling anxious, I was also filled with curiosity, as I was about to meet my past self and explore the unknown depths of my being. With great anticipation, I hoped to uncover the lost memories I had been searching for.

name: 【SPAP #31】道．不盡｜Dao · Silent Mystery
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

在遙遠的古代，我是一位天使，翱翔在一個山谷圍繞的原始部落上空。原始人們胸口燃燒著不同顏色的生命之火，有黑、紫、綠、白，代表著不同的善惡程度和祖先。白色火焰象徵著善良，代表著天使的後裔，而黑色火焰則象徵著貪婪，代表著那些嚮往地面的祖先。紫色和綠色的火焰則代表著慾望和純真的結合，雖然邪念存在，但人們依然保持著希望和信仰。



在村落的東北方，一個石製火箭聳立在祭壇上，許多人圍繞著它，靜靜地凝望著。他們嚮往回到天界，但黑火祖先因為貪婪而被囚禁在地面，而單純的白火後裔也因為被騙而失去了自由。



唉！這就是「道」，自然規律看似平淡，卻也是幸福的本源。只有人類的貪欲和追求，才讓自己的幸福掀起漣漪，破壞了這本應如此美好的故事。

－

【Dream Story】

In a distant ancient time, I was an angel who flew above a primitive tribe nestled in a valley. The people of the tribe had life flames burning in their chests, each with a different color representing their ancestors and their level of goodness or evilness. The white flame, symbolizing goodness and purity, represented the lineage of my angelic kin, while the black flame, representing greed and desire, represented the ancestors who yearned for the earthly realm. The purple and green flames were the offspring of the union of desire and innocence, and though they were plagued by evil thoughts, they still held onto hope and faith.



To the northeast of the village, a stone rocket stood tall on an altar, surrounded by many people who gazed upon it in silence. They yearned to return to the heavens, but the black flame ancestors were imprisoned on earth due to their greed, while the simple white flame descendants had lost their freedom due to deceit.



Alas, this is the "Dao," the natural law that may seem ordinary but is the source of true happiness. Only human greed and pursuit create ripples that disturb the otherwise beautiful story.

name: 【SPAP #32】畫韻深處預留區｜Reserved Area in the Depths of Painting
description:
※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

筆墨深處潛藏，綻放無限可能，以心繪畫未來，散發絢麗光芒，翩翩起舞於畫韻深處。

－

【Dream Story】

Hidden deep within the strokes of the brush lies boundless potential, as the heart paints the future and radiates with resplendent light, dancing gracefully amidst the depths of artistic expression.

※標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

Artwork marked with AP is the artist's proof version. Please do not purchase it. If you would like to buy, please go to [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)

－

【夢境故事】

筆墨深處潛藏，綻放無限可能，以心繪畫未來，散發絢麗光芒，翩翩起舞於畫韻深處。

－

【Dream Story】

Hidden deep within the strokes of the brush lies boundless potential, as the heart paints the future and radiates with resplendent light, dancing gracefully amidst the depths of artistic expression.
